newsitem.title: UK: OPEC basket price $23.47 on Monday.
newsitem.headline: OPEC basket price $23.47 on Monday.

text.p: The price of the OPEC basket of seven crudes stood at $23.47 a barrel on Monday, against $23.31 on Friday, the OPECNA news agency said, quoting the OPEC secretariat.
The basket comprises Algeria's Saharan Blend, Indonesia's Minas, Nigeria's Bonny Light, Saudi Arabia's Arabian Light, Dubai of the UAE, Venezuela's Tia Juana and Mexico's Isthmus.
